comment.author: 91829349@N00
comment._content: Suppose "1860" is the address, or the year the tower was built?

comment.author: 93484860@N00
comment._content: If I were a betting Man, this would be Fort Frederik in Frederiksted, St. Croix, USVI. This would be the side entrance to the Fort. The windows with the danish shutters are the same as today, however, the clock tower is not there now. What's interesting is that a date similar to this one is located inside which dates 1760.
